item.title: Getting started with if-statement
item.description: Introduction to the if statement # The if statement is a conditional statement that allows a program to enter or not a specific section of code depending if the condition(s) of the statement are met or not. It can be found in mostly all the existing programming languages. The if statement will usually take the following shape: if(statement) { // Code to execute } The code in the brackets will only be executed if the statement is true.
